data.news_body: Dear Sirs,We refer to our letter dated 25th September, 2023, informing about earnings call to be held today, i.e. 19th October, 2023, relating to the Q2FY24 financial results.In terms of Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations, we write to inform you that the audio recording of the earnings call is available at: https://www.ultratechcement.com/investors/financialsThe same is for your information and record please.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: In terms of Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirement), Regulations 2015, please find attached transcript of the Q4 FY-23 Earnings Conference Call conducted after the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company held on 28th April, 2023, for your information and record.The same is also available on Company''s website: www.ultratechcement.comThe same is for your information please.

data.news_body: We refer to our letter dated 1st March, 2023, informing you about earnings call to be held today, i.e. 28th April, 2023, relating to the Q4FY23 financial results.In terms of Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirement), Regulations 2015, we write to inform you that the audio recording of the earnings call is available at:https://www.ultratechcement.com/investors/financialsThe same is for your information and record please.Yours very

data.caption: Compliance Under Regulation 23(9) Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body:
In terms of Regulation 23(9) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we enclose disclosure of Related Party Transactions on a consolidated basis, in the format specified in the accounting standards for
the half year ended 31st March, 2021.
